message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a unique opportunity to get your hands on something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $120 for it. Can you meet me in the middle?

I understand that $150 might be a bit out of your budget, Bob. However, I'm willing to compromise. I can offer it to you for $135. It's a fair price considering the value this product can bring to you.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $135 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $125 for the product. Can we meet in the middle again?

I'm willing to meet you halfway, Bob. I can offer it to you for $130. It's a fair price considering the value this product can bring to you, and I'm willing to make a slight concession to get the deal done.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above $130. I'm willing to pay $125 for the product. I'm hoping we can get even closer to a deal.

I understand you're still looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $128. It's the lowest I can go, but I'm willing to make this sacrifice to get the deal done.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice, but $128 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $122 for the product. I'm hoping we can meet on this price and finalize the deal.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I can offer it to you for $125. This is as low as I can go, and I'm willing to make this sacrifice to get the deal done.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $125, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $120 for the product. This is my final offer, and I hope we can meet on this price.
